name: FC-APOLLO
short_description:
** UPDATE::STATUS **
We are in the process of uploading our benchmarking code and testing with selected groups over the next few weeks.  If you wish to be part of the test group please see the contact information below.
****************************
For info: please contact david.harvey@ballard dot com

FC-APOLLO is an open-source application package for simulation of performance and durability of Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells.  

The software suite includes physics encompassing beginning of life performance and subsequent material degradation due to platinum dissolution and carbon corrosion.

FC-APOLLO developed by Ballard Power Systems with funding from the United States Department of Energy, under contract #DE-EE0000466.  

This simulation suite is a derivative work of OpenFOAM, which is owned and developed by OpenCFD.  FC-APOLLO is not endorsed or affiliated with OpenFOAM or OpenCFD in any way
summary: Performance and Durability Simulation Suite for Fuel Cell Applications
